instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00138-A green light no fan spin
threads.message:
Hi, got an  820-00138-A that sometimes turns on and sometimes doesn't.

When it doesn't these are the voltages:


PPBUS_G3H: 12.54v

PP3V42_G3H: 3.4v

PP5V_S5: 5v

PP5V_S4: 0v

PP3V3_S5: 3.3v

PP3V3_S4: 0v

PP3V3_SUS: 3.3v

PP1V05_SUS: 1.05v

threads.title: 820-00138-A green light no fan spin
threads.message:
Are you using original 85W Magsafe 2 charger?

Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L.
If catch it, check for pulse PM_SLP_S4_L (at same time).
